response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be equally beneficial for you. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $900,000. We understand its true worth is $1,200,000, but we hope this offer presents an attractive proposition for you. Should you choose to accept, you will be making a wise investment that could potentially yield significant returns. Please let us know if you require any further information or assistance.", "product_price": 900000}
